description.zh: 学习使用条件判断绘制矩形，理解坐标范围和边界检测。
description.en: Learn to draw rectangles using conditional statements and understand coordinate ranges and boundary detection.

zh: 理解如何使用逻辑与（&&）组合条件来定义矩形区域。
学习根据UV坐标的x和y值进行边界检测。
掌握在GLSL中使用条件语句（如`if`或`step`）绘制简单形状。
en: Understand how to use logical AND (&&) to combine conditions to define a rectangular area.
Learn to perform boundary detection based on the x and y values of UV coordinates.
Master drawing simple shapes in GLSL using conditional statements (e.g., `if` or `step`).
